Pre-Game Insights: Mason Black will start for the San Francisco Giants as they prepare to take on the Miami Marlins on Saturday night at Oracle Park.
Giants manager Bob Melvin told media prior to Friday's game that Black would start.
Black is the Giants’ No. 8 prospect per MLB.com and their third-highest ranked pitching prospect.
Black has spent the bulk of his season with Sacramento, where he has gone 5-6 with a 4.59 ERA.
